Decrees Personnel FAQ

A Matter of Gravitas. And Gravity.

Due to unscheduled relocations of the entire municipal superstructure, combined with the strategic thermal regulation activities of Generalissimo Meow, all citizens are advised that 'permanence' is now a theoretical concept. Your cooperation in this fluid operational reality is not requested, but mandated.

Official Decrees & Complications

Decree 74-B: Mandatory Juice Box Rations

To bolster morale and Vitamin C levels, all citizens shall be issued one (1) juice box (flavour non-negotiable) daily.

STATUS: DELAYED

The master distribution list is currently serving as a mid-morning thermal regulation surface for the Generalissimo. His comfort is paramount to national security.

Building Relocation Schedule, Q3

The thrice-daily, seismically-unpredictable relocation of all government and residential structures. Be advised.

STATUS: CLASSIFIED BY CAT

The schedule is under the cat. We do not know where we will be tomorrow. Please pack a bag and wear sensible shoes. This is not a drill. Well, we can't find the drill schedule either.

Decree 101-C: Abolition of Naps

To maximize revolutionary fervor, all napping, snoozing, and/or dozing by non-feline personnel is hereby forbidden under penalty of tickling.

STATUS: IRONIC

The relevant parchment is, you will be shocked to learn, unavailable. It is pinned by an exquisitely sleeping hypocrite.

Personnel File: Archibald P. Feline

Minister of Document Integrity

A career civil servant dedicated to the Dewey Decimal system and the sanctity of the well-filed form. Believes a triplicate carbon copy is the cornerstone of civilization. Currently questioning all life choices and the structural integrity of his favorite filing cabinet.

Decree 22-A: Official State Colors

The official colors of the Regency are hereby declared to be Surgical Green and Clinical White, to signify our commitment to a clean and orderly revolution.

STATUS: PARTIALLY IMPLEMENTED

The Generalissimo has recently shed upon the master color swatches. Our official accent color is now "Ginger Tabby Orange." We are awaiting a ruling on whether this constitutes a coup.

Personnel File: Brenda

Under-Secretary of Stapler Procurement

Specializes in the acquisition of non-crinkly paper and silent-action staplers. After the 'Crinkle Incident' of Q2, she lives in a constant state of low-grade terror and subsists entirely on lukewarm tea. Believes the cat is a government psy-op.

Frequently Asked Questions

My street has been relocated to the industrial sector. Why?

Please consult the Building Relocation Schedule. If you cannot find the schedule, know that we, too, cannot find the schedule. It is likely warm and audibly vibrating. We suggest making friends with your new, smokestack-equipped neighbors.

I have a revolutionary idea! Where do I submit it?

All revolutionary innovations must be submitted in triplicate on Form 87-C, "The Spark of Genius". Please be aware that Form 87-C is printed on the softest, most absorbent paper, making it the preferred bedding of the Fur-st Estate. Your genius is appreciated, but mostly for its thread count.

Is the toddler dictator aware of this situation?

The Supreme Leader is currently focused on matters of high-level graham cracker diplomacy and juice box treaty negotiations. He has delegated all documentary and feline matters to this ministry. We feel this is a very efficient division of labor.

Memo: On The Subject of Paw Prints

Please be advised that paw prints on official documents are not an abstract artistic statement. They are a territorial claim. Do not attempt to wipe them off. We tried once. The Under-Secretary of Inkwells is still in therapy.

STATUS: NON-NEGOTIABLE

"Order from Chaos. Preferably Laminated."
